      Constructor parameters in com.att.research.xacml.std with type arguments of type AttributeAssignment 
      Constructor and Description
      StdAdvice(Identifier adviceId, java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> attributeAssignmentsIn)
      Creates an immutable StdAdvice with the given Identifier as the XACML AdviceId and the given Collection of AttributeAssignments representing the XACML AttributeAssignment elements.
      StdMutableAdvice(Identifier idIn, java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> attributeAssignmentsIn)
      Creates a new StdMutableAdvice with the given com.att.research.xacml.Identifier as its unique identifier, and the given Collection of com.att.research.xacml.AttributeAssignments.
      StdMutableObligation(Identifier idIn, java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> attributeAssignmentsIn)
      Creates a new StdMutableObligation with the given Identifier representing the XACML ObligationId and the given Collection of AttributeAssignments representing the XACML AttributeAssignments for the Obligation.
      StdObligation(Identifier identifier, java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> attributeAssignments)
      Creates a new immutable StdObligation with the given Identifier representing the XACML ObligationId and a copy of the given Collection of AttributeAssignments representing the AttributeAssignment elements of the Obligation represented by the new StdObligation.
